publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7705♦ Linda Fabiani: Scottish Chambers International—That the Parliament welcomes the establishment of Scottish Chambers International by Scottish Chambers of Commerce, including Lanarkshire Chamber of Commerce; considers that this will offer an unparalleled range of specialist international trade support services to the Scottish business community, and congratulates Scottish Chambers of Commerce on this enterprise.

S3M-7705♦ Linda Fabiani: Scottish Chambers International—That the Parliament welcomes the establishment of Scottish Chambers International by Scottish Chambers of Commerce, including Lanarkshire Chamber of Commerce; considers that this will offer an unparalleled range of specialist international trade support services to the Scottish business community, and congratulates Scottish Chambers of Commerce on this enterprise.
S3M-7705♦ Scottish Chambers International (lodged on 13 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-7705# Scottish Chambers International (lodged on 13 January 2011) Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Jamie McGrigor*, Stuart McMillan*, Brian Adam*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-7705# Scottish Chambers International (lodged on 13 January 2011) Gil Paterson*
